user.bio: Certified Cicerone, BJCP Judge - Rank Pending

beer.beer_description: Inspiriert durch traditionelles Brauwissen, das Theodor König auf seinen Reisen sammelte, brauen wir dieses vollmundig-süffige Kellerbier. Edle Aromahopfensorten, spezielle Caramelmalze und eine lange, kühle Reifung machen unser bernsteinfarbenes Zwickl zu einer fein-milden, naturbelassenen Bierspezialität.

An elegant effervescence gives way to malty sweetness intermingled with the delicate bitterness of herbs, finishing with a pleasant aftertaste. A well-balanced pilsner with an intense flavor but a delicately subtle overall impression.

items.badge_description: It's the final week! Week 4 wraps with the last 3 styles of this year's Year in Beer Style Hunt. You've just tried one of three available styles during the week.

Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!

items.badge_description: It's the final week! Week 4 wraps with the last 3 styles of this year's Year in Beer Style Hunt. You've just tried one of three available styles during the week.

Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 430 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 87!
Light and crisp, a Pilsner is all you need to make your day great. Though, perhaps another one would make it even better. That’s 130 different Pilsners. Try 5 more for Level 27!

Das sind mindestens 105 deutsche Biere! David Hasselhoff would be proud of you. Prost!

That's 105 different German Beers! Try 5 more for Level 22.

items.badge_description: One cannot live on dank hops alone. Tone down the bitterness and enjoy some smooth flavor. That's 195 different beers with an IBU of 20 or below. Try 5 more for Level 40!

These styles have a long history dating back to the middle ages. While they may be called "cellar beers", it's best to drink them as fresh as possible! That's 10 different beers that have the style of Zwickel / Kellerbier. Try 5 more for Level 3!

items.checkin_comment: Barack Obama fragte mich einmal, was das widerwärtigste ist was mir jemals wiederfanden ist. Ich antwortete mit „Bitburger“ bevor ich König Pilsener probierte. Das niederträchtigste, widerwärtigste, geschmackloseste „Bier“ das ich je gesehen habe.
